abstract: Driven column review of 2015 Nissan Murano sedan.
lead_paragraph: The company doesn’t tend to play it safe with design, and the new Murano has elements, like its flowing brightwork, that are bold and refreshing.
snippet: The company doesn’t tend to play it safe with design, and the new Murano has elements, like its flowing brightwork, that are bold and refreshing.

headline.main: Video Review: The 2015 Nissan Murano, Dressed Up and Looking Good
headline.print_headline: The 2015 Nissan Murano, Dressed Up and Looking Good
